draft.description: DRAFT VERSION will be replaced in the citation with the selected version once the dataset has been published.

deaccessioned.description: DEACCESSIONED VERSION has been added to the citation for this version since it is no longer available.

publishInProgress.heading: Publish in Progress
publishInProgress.alertText: The dataset is locked while the persistent identifiers are being registered or updated, and/or the physical files are being validated.

filesUpdated.heading: Success!
filesUpdated.alertText: One or more files have been updated.

termsUpdated.heading: Success!
termsUpdated.alertText: The terms for this dataset have been updated.

datasetDeleted.heading: Success!
datasetDeleted.alertText: This dataset draft has been deleted.

metadataUpdated.heading: Success!
metadataUpdated.alertText: The metadata for this dataset has been updated.

draftVersion.heading: This draft version needs to be published
draftVersion.alertText: When ready for sharing, please publish it so that others can see these changes

requestedVersionNotFound.heading: Info
requestedVersionNotFound.alertText: Version {{requestedVersion}} was not found. This is version {{returnedVersion}}.

requestedVersionNotFoundShowDraft.heading: Info
requestedVersionNotFoundShowDraft.alertText: Version {{requestedVersion}} was not found. This is the DRAFT version.

shareUnpublishedDataset.heading: Unpublished Dataset Private URL
shareUnpublishedDataset.alertText: Privately share this dataset before it is published: {{privateUrl}}

unpublishedDataset.heading: Unpublished Dataset Private URL
unpublishedDataset.alertText: This unpublished dataset is being privately shared.

publish.draftQuestion: Are you sure you want to publish this dataset? Once you do so, it must remain published.
publish.draftSubtext: This version of the dataset will be published with the following terms:
publish.previouslyReleasedQuestion: Are you sure you want to republish this dataset?
publish.previouslyReleasedSubtext: Select if this is a minor or major version update.
publish.releaseCollectionQuestion: This dataset cannot be published until {{parentCollectionName}} is published. Would you like to publish both right now?
publish.releaseCollectionSubtext: Once you publish this dataset it must remain published.
publish.requiresMajorReleaseSubtext: Due to the nature of the changes to the current draft this will be a major release ({{versionNumber}})
publish.termsText: To change the terms for this version, click the Cancel button and go to the Terms tab for this dataset.
publish.selectVersion: Select if this is a minor or major version update.
publish.updateCurrentVersion: Update Current Version (will permanently overwrite the latest published version)
publish.error: An error occurred while publishing the dataset.
